a: Google-Drive-Direct is a site you can generate direact download link of your files which are uploded in any File host like Google Drive , Mediafire etc. its free to use and don't need any personal data.
It's easy, just copy (Copy and Paste) the URL of the video you want to download from MediaFire.com . Then click genrate button..and done..you will get a diereact download link of your file.

q: Can i use the links on Movie App ?
a: Yes, you can use the generated direact link of you file in you movie app. so your user can download or stream the video file.

q: Did it Support Diffrent File Hosts ?
a: Yes, there are so many supported file hsot that uou can use the links to generate the Direact dowload links. ex : anonfile.com, google.com, mediafire.com, mp4upload.com, racaty.com, solidfiles.com, upfile.mobi, uppit.com, userscloud.com, vidoza.net, supervideo.tv, gounlimited.to.
